thread.title: Khudobin stops 34 shots as Ducks beat Wild 4-1 for 1st win
thread.title_full: Khudobin stops 34 shots as Ducks beat Wild 4-1 for 1st win

author: senh
title: Khudobin stops 34 shots as Ducks beat Wild 4-1 for 1st win
text: BING NEWS: Khudobin stops 34 shots as Ducks beat Wild 4-1 for 1st win ANAHEIM, Calif. (AP) -- Anton Khudobin rebounded from a rough outing with 34 saves, and the Anaheim Ducks got goals from Cam Fowler, Rickard Rakell and Mike Santorelli to beat the Minnesota Wild 4-1 on Sunday night for their first victory of the season. 10/18/2015 - 4:00 pm | View Link Perry, Khudobin help Ducks Defeat Sharks The Ducks ... shots, while Jones turned aside six. Wagner would tie the game early in the third period on an impressive individual effort. After creating a turnover in the neutral zone, Wagner entered the zone on a 2-on-1 with Harry Zolnierczyk and beat ... 09/25/2015 - 9:00 pm | View Link Reeling Wild rebound on Anton Khudobin's first career shutout The Minnesota Wild are the only blemish on the Vancouver Canucks' division record.
